videos.description: Brandon Wimbush spoke with ESPN's Marty Smith after Notre Dame gets off to a quality start by beating Michigan 24-17.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Interview (Wimbush: ND has room to improve) 2018/09/01

videos.headline: Wimbush: ND has room to improve
